derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: probably from obsolete bug 'bogey' (of unknown origin) + bear

entry.def: Something or someone that is your bugbear worries or upsets you.

means.word_mean: 1. an imaginary monster used to frighten children
2. an object of dread or apprehension;

sentences.sentence: "Germany was always a bugbear for France"
